This article is about a feature, subsystem, or proposal that has been deprecated by new developments. Currently its only purpose is as an archive but this page may be removed.

Skills

Skills can only be performed with the right weapontype equiped.

Weapon Aura's(offensive)

?

Double hit

Double damage

Attack Increase

Buffs/debuffs(defensive)

Stat

Temporarly increases a certain stat for a period of time and taking an amount of mana/stamina depending on the level of the buff. 

Example: Animal Rage skill: STR +2(**int*sklvl) for 20secs(**int*sklvl) taking 10MP(*skilllevel)

Skill buffs

Temporarly increases a certain skill for a period of time and taking an amount of mana/stamina depending on the level of the buff. 

Example: Mole's Claws skill: Digging +1(*int*sklvl) for 10secs(*int*sklvl) taking 20MP(*skilllevel)

Weapon buffs

Temporarly increases a certain weapon mastery for a period of time and taking an amount of mana/stamina depending on the level of the buff. 

Example: Hawk's Eye skill: Bow +3(*dex*sklvl) for 40secs(*dex*sklvl) taking 40SP(*skilllevel)

HP/MP/Stamina buffs

Temporarly increases a certain attribute for a period of time and taking an amount of mana/stamina depending on the level of the buff. 

Example: Health fortitude skill: HP +10(*con*sklvl) for 20secs(*con*sklvl) taking 20SP(*skilllevel)

Drains

Temporarly decreases a certain attribute and adds that to the casters attribute for a period of time and taking an amount of mana depending on the level of the drain. 

Example: MP Drain: MP -5(*(int*wis)/2*sklvl) MP +3(*(int*wis)/2*sklvl) for 10secs taking 10HP(*skilllevel)

Spells(offensive)

Elemental

Casts an elemental spell. 

Example: FireBall: DMG 10(*int*sklvl) taking 20SP(*skilllevel)

Buffs

Temporarly decreases a certain attribute for a period of time and taking an amount of mana depending on the level of the buff. 

Example: Poison skill: DMG 5(*int*sklvl) for 20secs(*skilllevel) taking 15MP(*skilllevel)

Drain

Temporarly decreases a certain attribute and adds that to the casters attribute for a period of time and taking an amount of mana depending on the level of the drain. 

Example: HP Drain: DMG 5(*int*sklvl) HP +3(*int*sklvl) for 10secs taking 30MP(*skilllevel)

Shields

Casts a permanent shield that acts like a buffer for damage, lasts untill the buffer is depleated or untill its uncast. 

Example: Mana Shield: absorbs all damage (drain = damage/*int*sklvl), takes 5MP(*skilllevel) to cast.

Summons (defensive)

Summon

Temporarly summons a certain creature for a period of time and taking an amount of mana depending on the level of the spell. 

Example: Giant Butterfly summon: 60secs(**int*sklvl) taking 30MP(*skilllevel/1.5)

Pet

Summons a certain creature untill its dead. taking an amount of mana depending on the level of the spell. 

Example: Deer Bear Pet: stats of the creature *int*sklvl, taking 60MP(*skilllevel/1.5)

Occupations

Harvesting

Getting certain items from an other entity.

Crafting

Getting items by combining several other items.

Mining

Targeting a location or area to mine for items.


Skill Variations

Spells and Buffs should aswell be able to come in an Area of Effect variation and change certain states on the entity. 

Example: Nature Struggle: AGI-20(*int*sklvl) and unmoveable(!) for 5secs(*int*sklvl) for 35MP(*skllvl)

Example: Unicorn's charm: Run speed * min(1.5, (dex*sklvl)/70) for 10secs(*dex*sklvl) for 25MP(*skllvl)


Skill Combinations

Each skill implements a certain behaviour, being able to combine them forming more complex skills would be a very nice advantage. 

Example: Knight Blessing: STR+3 Buff, sword mastery buff +10, 20secs(*sklvl), 
        taking 15MP(*sklvl), 10SP(*sklvl)  (buff stat + buff mastery)

Example: Hell Fire(AoE): 40 DMG(*int*sklvl) + 10DMG for 20secs(*skilllvl) taking 45MP(*skllvl)
          (spell elemental + spell debuff)

Example: Sonic Bang(AoE): 30 DMG(*int*sklvl) + DEX-20(*int*sklvl) for 5secs(*skilllvl) 
         taking 45MP(*skllvl)  (spell elemental + debuff stat)
